name: Diablo III: Reaper of Souls - Collector's Edition
summary:
This collector's edition of Diablo III: Reaper of Souls includes the following:

- Diablo III: Reaper of Souls
- Behind-the-scene DVD and Bluray disc set
- Reaper of Souls soundtrack
- Reaper of Souls art book
- A Malthael mouse pad
- In-game transmogriphications
- In-game Spectral Hound companion
- Diablo III's Treasure Goblin as a pet for World of Warcraft
- Starcraft II character portraits and decals
